TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_paluma, title = paluma, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/paluma} }

S.FORM: (kamu hu hulam: ) paluma kaku tu paza' i nu zikuzan nu luma'. . milihiza kita ci inaan paluma tu lami' i palami'an. . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
